scripts.dev: cd ../shared-thread-utils && npm run build && cd ../proxy && if [ -d dist ]; then rm -r dist; fi && if [ -d node_modules ]; then rm -r node_modules; fi && if [ -d .next ]; then rm -r .next; fi && yarn install && next dev
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules lib dist build tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.build:prod: cd ../shared-thread-utils && npm run build && cd ../proxy && if [ -d dist ]; then rm -r dist; fi && if [ -d node_modules ]; then rm -r node_modules; fi && if [ -d .next ]; then rm -r .next; fi && yarn install && next build
